record.field: Extra Paid Impact Day Off
Redeem 500 Impact Points for an extra paid day off to volunteer or rest. Managers will be notified for approval.
Premium Reusable Coffee Mug
A high-quality, sustainable coffee mug to reduce disposable waste.
100 AED Donation Match
The company will match your next 100 AED donation to a pre-approved NGO.
Plant a Tree in Your Name
We will partner with a local environmental group to plant one tree in your name.
Insulated Branded Water Bottle
A premium, insulated water bottle to help you stay hydrated and reduce plastic use.
Sustainability Workshop Access
Gain access to an exclusive online workshop on a sustainability topic (e.g., home composting, sustainable investing).
Lunch with Leadership
Redeem your points for a 1-on-1 lunch with a member of the company's leadership team to discuss sustainability and more.
Eco-Friendly Tote Bag
A stylish, durable tote bag made from recycled materials for your daily shopping.
Recycled Paper Notebook
A high-quality A5 notebook and pen set, made entirely from recycled materials.
50 AED Donation Match
A smaller donation match. The company will match your next 50 AED donation to a pre-approved NGO.
Personal Carbon Offset
The company will make a contribution to a certified carbon offset project on your behalf.
Green Commute Subsidy
Redeem for a 200 AED subsidy on a public transport pass or bicycle maintenance to encourage green commuting.
